chapters.title: Chapter 30:  Men Dream Here
chapters.info: Lacile Aldorwin, p. 469—Short, pale, very slender Cairhienin woman with short hair. She walks very gracefully. She was taken captive by the Shaido along with Faile and her servants. The man who captured her, Jhoradin, fell in love with her; it is not known whether Lacile returned his feelings or was simply pretending in order to ensure her protection. She did feel much remorse about Jhoradin's death, however. She has taken to wearing twice as many red ribbons in her hair since being freed from the Shaido.
